field.name: description
field.value: The Binder Component is only used to support other components (Monorail DataBind) and it doesn't seem to be used on its own. Therefore it doesn't require to have a web site page. The page that is being removed is http://www.castleproject.org/components/binder/index.html, and it currently doesn't serve any purpose. A lot of the doco for this component is documented as part of Monorail.

comment.author: rbellamy
comment.text: I think, rather than completely removing the page, we might want to point to the DataBind and ARDataBind documentation. What do you think?

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: You mean have a page with links to other pages?

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Up to you, but I don't see the point. That is the reason why I completely removed the page.

comment.author: rbellamy
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''1.1.0''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
